refnamediv.refpurpose: combine the iceberg restart files, taking into account any files without icebergs

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: iceberg_comb.sh takes a list of FMS iceberg restart files, and combines them using the NCO record concatenation utility ncrcat. It checks the list of <in_file> to determine if they actually contain any icebergs prior to performing the ncrcat.
